intro.welcome: Welcome to our wedding website! We are so excited to celebrate our special day with you.

info.heading: practical info
info.details:
Our wedding weekend will take place in Jamshedpur on October 24 & 25, 2025.
Please plan to arrive by October 23rd so that you can settle in.
More details on flights, hotels, and transportation are below.

mehendi.title: mehendi ceremony (10:00–13:00)
mehendi.points:
• Mehndi, otherwise known as henna, is a paste associated with positive spirits and good luck.
  • We invite you to get your hands decorated with this immersive Indian tradition.
  • Attire: Celebratory colours - flowy pants, dresses, or something simple!

sangeet.title: sangeet & cocktail night (18:00–22:00)
sangeet.points:
• A celebratory evening of music and dance.
  • Attire: festive or semi-formal.

haldi.title: haldi ceremony (10:00–13:00)
haldi.points:
• Haldi, Holi and Games fun outdoor activities.
  • Attire: Comfortable outdoor wear. Preferably light colours that you don't mind getting messy in.

wedding.title: wedding ceremony (16:00–18:00)
wedding.points:
• Witness a modified Indian wedding ceremony.
  • Attire: traditional Indian or formal Western.

reception.title: reception & dinner (18:00–21:00)
reception.points: • Join us for an intimate dinner under the stars.

questions.accommodation:
Where can I stay?
Fill out the RSVP form and we will take care of it for you.
questions.plusOne:
Can I bring a plus one?
Of course! Please let us know when you RSVP.
questions.visa:
Do I need a visa?
Depending on your country of residence, yes. Check the Indian government's e-visa guidelines. Belgians and Swedes can get an e-visa here.
